communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All materials and correspondence between the Croton-Harmon Board of Education, Croton-Harmon School District Administration, Croton-Harmon Equity Committee, Faculty, Staff, Third Party Contractors and Consultants related to the following subjects or topics between April 2021 to the date this request is fulfilled:

Gender and Sexuality
Gender expression
LGBTQ+
Transgender hormone treatment
gender non-conforming
non-binary
cigender
Pronouns
Gender dysphoria
gender detransition 
Dr. John Money
Reimer twins

This request shall also include any teachings of such curriculum mentioned above by any School District Nurse(s) employed within this district, third party contractors, consultants or other third parties invited by the school or agents of the school.

This request shall also include any documents or materials accessed by the school district, but stored on third party service providers on behalf of the district, and links/references/credentials for access to such materials if present in emails or electronic systems or files stored in browser caches, cloud storage (i.e. Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, etc), or local hard drives managed by the district.  This request shall also include non-school email services used by the Croton-Harmon Board of Education, Administration and Faculty to conduct activities and business related to the school district (i.e. Gmail, Outlook, etc).  

This request shall also include any training material or supplemental information provided to district staff, whether required or suggested.

Please keep in mind, pursuant to the Retention and Disposition Schedule for New York Local Government Records (LGS-01): Any record listed in the LGS-01 Schedule for which a Freedom of Information (FOIL) request has been received should not be destroyed until that request has been answered and until any potential appeal is made and resolved, even if the retention period of the record has passed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Parents Coalition

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Re-Release Request
communications.communication:
Dear FOIA/PA Officer:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, we hereby request the following records on behalf of the Al Otro Lado #DetentionKills Transparency Initiative:

All records released by ICE to the requester in the request assigned tracking number 2018-ICLI-00052.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,
Andrew Free
